pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, March 19, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the third floor foyer of West Block as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Budget Speech, to be delivered by the Minister of Finance, Bill Morneau, in the House of Commons.
